recipe.title: Fennel and Parsley Salad
ingredients: 4 baby fennel, trimmed and thinly sliced
Sea salt and cracked black pepper
instructions: Place the fennel and parsley in a serving bowl and toss to combine. Place the orange juice, oil, mustard, salt, and pepper in a bowl and whisk to combine. Pour over the salad and serve with the simple leek and ricotta tarts .
